amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to modify a military installation in the U.S., including construction or modification of a facility on a military installation, to produce housing for unaccompanied alien children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to modify a military installation in the U.S., including construction or modification of a facility on a military installation, to produce housing for unaccompanied alien children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 202 (Roll no. 222).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
